name: nashorn-app-starter
description: An app skeleton to quickly start with Nashorn
author: Pedro S. Sanders

scripts.start: export NODE_PATH=.libs/node_modules && echo "load('.libs/node_modules/jvm-npm/src/main/javascript/jvm-npm.js');" > .start.js && cat .libs/node_modules/main.js >> .start.js && jjs .start.js && rm .start.js
